summary: This is the final version of Virile ENB exclusively released for a wider audience. Enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/VirileENBfinalee-5.png[/IMG]

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

                          [color=DodgerBlue] [size=7]|-Description-|[/size] [/color]


[color=white] [size=5]Virile is the best way to describe this ENB preset. Powerful, realistic, and vibrant. A great attention to small things, like lighting and bloom which rival some of the most visually stunning games, make this ENB among the best.  I hope you enjoy the preset as much as I did! [/size] [/color]

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

                           [color=Crimson] [size=6]|-Screenshots-|[/size] [/color]

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/2012-11-08_00034.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/adas-1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/2012-11-17_00138.jpg[/IMG]
[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]


[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size] 

                                              [color=DodgerBlue] [size=6]|-Videos-|[/color][/size] 


[size=25] [youtube]bhb1m1Pd_0c[/youtube] [/size]           [size=25][youtube]JRqUxjyXkGM&feature=ghighu[/youtube] [/size] 

[color=grey] [size=16]__________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size] 

[color=Crimson][size=6]|-Installation-|[/color][/size] 
[size=4]
Open the \\\\\\\"rar\\\\\\\" file you downloaded, copy or highlight the files in the \\\\\\\"v2.4\\\"file\\\\, and copy them to (C:\\\\\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\\\\\Steam\\\\\\\\SteamApps\\\\\\\\common\\\\\\\\skyrim). After you have done that, open the \\\\\\\"Data\\\\\\\" folder, and move the \\\\\\\"light123\\\\\\\" file to the Data file. [/size]

[color=grey] [size=16]_______________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=DodgerBlue] [size=6]|-This ENB includes-|[/size] [/color] 

[size=4]Detailed Shadows - Photo-realistic Faces and Features

 Light Dof - Realistic Fire, Smoke, and Embers

 Tweaked Bloom (for fires, light and such) - Sun Rays

  HDR - SSAO (Disable if you have perfomance issues)
[/size]
[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=Crimson] [size=6] |-Troubleshooting-|[/size] [/color]

[size=4]If you have any issues, read the Readme or relay them to me in the chat. [/size]

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=white] [size=4]Make sure to download the DLL  required for all ENBs [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0123.htm]--here--[/url][/size] [/color].

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]
[color=DodgerBlue] [size=6] |-My Specs-|[/size] [/color]     
                                                         
[size=4]
GPU: GTX 560 Ti MSI Twin Frozr II OC  
RAM: G-Skill
PU Cooler: Corsair A70     
Fan Control: NZXT Sentry Mesh 
FPS: 45-50  
[/size]                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                    
[color=grey] [size=16]____________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]   
         
[color=Crimson] [size=6]|-Many thanks to-|[/size] [/color]

T.A.Z. 
Matso
Boris
